DOC.brief_summary: This study examine difference effectiveness two natural compound , eicosapentanoic ( EPA ) docosahexanoic ( DHA ) omega-3 fatty acid , treat major depressive disorder . Both type omega-3 fatty acid commonly find fish oil . It believe deficiency omega-3 fatty acid may lead development major depression .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Omega 3-Fatty Acids , EPA Versus DHA , Treatment Major Depression
DOC.detailed_description: The study last eight week involve four visit screen baseline visit ( biweekly ) . Participants randomize , choose chance , enter one three group . People first group take 1 g/day EPA omega-3 fatty acid , second group take 1 g/day DHA omega-3 fatty acid , third group take placebo . This study double-blind , mean neither participant , doctor , research staff know group person . At end study participant offer three month follow-up care Depression Clinical Research Program .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 1880 year old . Must meet criterion current Major Depressive Disorder . Serious unstable medical illness include cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , endocrine , neurologic , hematologic disease History seizure disorder . Substance use disorder , include alcohol , active within last six month ( past history OK ) . History multiple adverse drug reaction allergy study drug .
